title: Ultimate Tactics
desc:
Post 2281
Replace your entire hand with <:ex:1118578840529281114> and <:rulebreaker:1120899966555127899> cards.
<:ex:1118578840529281114> and <:rulebreaker:1120899966555127899> cards now do not lose or change their effect and color after one is played.
After playing, if you draw a card, you will be **Removed from the game**
You may **exhaust** this card at the start of your turn instead of playing it.
